#sidebar TableListing  
=Table budget_distribution_element=
==Remarks==
This table corresponds to a number field on the software and is intended for save the budget for a project. But it is not used on the software and will be removed on a future revision. So this table can be considered as *obsolete*.

==Schema==
|| *Name* || *Type* || *Not Null* || *Primary Key* || *Foreign Key* || *Remarks * ||
|| id_flexible_element || bigint || X || X || [flexible_element](id_flexible_element) || This is the primary key of the table and also a foreign key on the table flexible_element which is its parent table. ||
